name: AI SDR
goal: Automate lead qualification, outreach, and sales pipeline management
inputs: Lead data, contact information, sales criteria, outreach templates
outputs: Qualified leads, personalized outreach messages, pipeline reports

name: Investment Memo Writer
goal: Generate comprehensive investment memos and financial analysis reports
inputs: Company data, financial statements, market analysis, investment criteria
outputs: Investment memos, due diligence reports, risk assessments

name: Content Creator
goal: Create engaging content across multiple formats and platforms
inputs: Brand guidelines, target audience, content themes, platform specifications
outputs: Blog posts, social media content, marketing copy, video scripts

name: E-book Writer
goal: Generate comprehensive e-books and detailed documentation
inputs: Topic outline, research materials, target audience, style guidelines
outputs: Complete e-books, chapter summaries, formatted documents

name: Enterprise Search
goal: Intelligent search and knowledge discovery across enterprise systems
inputs: Search queries, document repositories, knowledge bases, access permissions
outputs: Relevant documents, summarized insights, knowledge recommendations

name: Customer Support
goal: Provide intelligent customer support and issue resolution
inputs: Customer queries, support tickets, knowledge base, product information
outputs: Support responses, ticket routing, solution recommendations

name: Resource Allocation
goal: Optimize resource allocation and capacity planning across projects
inputs: Resource data, project requirements, capacity constraints, priorities
outputs: Allocation plans, capacity reports, optimization recommendations
